resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/105277</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>105277</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770207053</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">The Battle of Honey Springs: The Civil War Comes to the Indian Territory</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Die Schlacht der Honig-Frühlinge: Der 
Bürgerkrieg kommt zur indischen Gegend</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La bataille des ressorts de miel : La guerre
civile vient au territoire indien</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">A batalha das molas do mel: A guerra civil 
vem ao território indian</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">La battaglia delle molle del miele: La 
guerra civile viene al territorio indiano</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Η μάχη των ανοίξεων μελιού: Ο εμφύλιος πόλεμος 
έρχεται στο ινδικό έδαφος</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">La batalla de los resortes de la miel: La 
guerra civil viene al territorio indio</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">illustrates how the war, when it moved to the rolling prairie of now eastern Oklahoma, divided Native Americans. It includes maps, soldiers' accounts of the battle, and illustrations.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Social Sciences</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">veranschaulicht, wie der Krieg, als er auf das 
RollenGrasland von jetzt Ostoklahoma bewog, gebürtige 
Amerikaner teilte. Er schließt Karten, Konten der Soldaten der 
Schlacht und Abbildungen ein.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">illustre comment la guerre, quand elle s'est 
déplacée à la prairie de roulement de l'Oklahoma maintenant 
oriental, a divisé les Américains indigènes. Elle inclut des 
cartes, des comptes des soldats de la bataille, et des illustrations.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">ilustra como a guerra, quando se moveu para a 
pradaria do rolling de Oklahoma agora oriental, dividiu americanos 
nativos. Inclui mapas, clientes dos soldados da batalha, e 
ilustrações.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">illustra come la guerra, quando si è mossa verso 
il prairie di rolling di Oklahoma ora orientale, ha diviso gli 
Americani natali. Include i programmi, i clienti dei soldati 
della battaglia e le illustrazioni.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">επεξηγεί πώς ο πόλεμος, όταν κινήθηκε προς το 
κυλώντας λιβάδι της τώρα ανατολικής Οκλαχόμα, διαίρεσε εγγενείς
Αμερικανούς. Περιλαμβάνει τους χάρτες, τους απολογισμούς των
στρατιωτών της μάχης, και τις απεικονίσεις.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">ilustra cómo la guerra, cuando se movió a la 
pradera del balanceo de Oklahoma ahora del este, dividió a americanos
nativos. Incluye correspondencias, las cuentas de los soldados 
de la batalla, y las ilustraciones.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Sozialwissenschaften</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les Sciences Sociales</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ciências Sociais</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Scienze Sociali</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Κοινωνικές επιστήμες</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ciencias Sociales</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <metaMetadata>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770207053</entry>
          </identifier>
          <language>en</language>
        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>
          <language>en</language>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Custom License</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>105277</entry>
    </identifier>
    <name>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.manifestationNameValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>experience</value>
    </name>
    <item>
      <location>
        <uri>http://www.oercommons.org/courses/the-battle-of-honey-springs-the-civil-war-comes-to-the-indian-territory</uri>
      </location>
    </item>
  </manifestation>
</expression>
